headline: FedEx AI Push Targets Post Purchase Growth As Shares Trade Above Targets
summary: FedEx (NYSE:FDX) has launched new AI powered post purchase tools, FedEx Tracking+ and FedEx Returns+, across its global network. The offerings focus on digital tracking, returns management, and customer communication after checkout. CEO Raj Subramaniam has highlighted a wider AI rollout at FedEx, while keeping a measured stance on robotics and drones. FedEx, trading at $353.43, sits at the center of e commerce logistics, and its latest AI push is aimed squarely at the high friction post...
